I was so rooting for the Saints to go to the Super Bowl this season. And I was rooting for them to win it all after my Broncos didn't make it. It would have been a great Cinderella story. Oh well. Dream crushing Bears!!!!
 
 I'm still going to root for them, but only because I loathe the Colts.
 It would be nice to care who wins beyond wanting one team to lose more than the other.
 
 Poo emoticon_cry

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Dang Bears!
